question: When was the Central Plantation Crops Research Institute (CPCRI)Â  established?
explanation: Central Plantation Crops Research Institute (CPCRI) was established in 1970 as one of the agricultural research institutes in the National Agricultural Research System (NARS) under the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR). The present mandate of the institute is to conduct research and training on coconut, arecanut and cocoa.
